Package org.daisy.dotify.tasks.runner

Provides a framework for managing task chains.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TempFileWriter
    Provides an interface for copying files to a separate folder for debugging purposes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultTempFileWriter
    Provides a default implementation of TempFileWriter.
    DefaultTempFileWriter.Builder
    Creates a default temp file writer builder.
    Progress
    Provides simple progress measuring and reporting.
    RunnerResult
    Provides details about a task runner execution.
    RunnerResult.Builder
    Creates a new runner result builder.
    TaskRunner
    Utility class to run a list of tasks.
    TaskRunner.Builder
    Provides a builder for TaskRunner
    TaskRunnerCore
    Provides a utility for running a single task at a time.

Package org.daisy.dotify.tasks.runner Description

Provides a framework for managing task chains. This package contains a task system framework as well as a number of generic tasks. To retrieve a task system, use the TaskSystemFactoryMaker. To run a task system, use TaskRunner. To create a new task system, implement TaskSystemFactory and related classes.
